docs.title: PHP Form Validation
docs.text: This is a simple form validation using PHP. It uses PHP to check for form inputs to see if they are valid and generate the result.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Start the PHP server.
  3. Open the URL in your browser.
  4. Fill in the form and submit it.
  5. You will see the result of the form validation.
